author: CTPPS
body:
- `TotemDAQMappingESSourceXML` receives configuration per interval-of-validity.
- There are two mapping files:
  - `ctpps_mapping_to_fill_5288.xml`: before TS2
  - `ctpps_mapping_from_fill_5330.xml`: after TS2
- The association file - interval-of-validity is done in `EventFilter/CTPPSRawToDigi/python/totemRawToDigi_cff.py`
- A config file to test the configuration switching: `EventFilter/CTPPSRawToDigi/test/global_daq_test.py`
title: CTPPS: DAQ mapping per interval-of-validity
